description: Eric is a scientist that sought to defect to the Commonwealth. He was taken to safety by http://anidb.net/ch88461 [Ange] and her fellow spies http://anidb.net/ch88462 [Dorothy], http://anidb.net/ch88464 [Beatrice], http://anidb.net/ch88460 [Chise] and http://anidb.net/ch88463 [Princess], inside the Queen`s Mayfair School, a prestigious academy where they were posing as students.
name: Eric
